
---
title: '首发 17.3 英寸 3K 带鱼屏，联想 ThinkBook Plus 17 上架，7999 元起'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/f30136c8-b584-4016-adf7-25457778f696.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Sun, 24 Jul 2022 12:36:59 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/f30136c8-b584-4016-adf7-25457778f696.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="df58"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 7 月 24 日消息，联想 ThinkBook Plus 17 现已上架，首发 17.3 英寸 3K 带鱼屏，标配 i7-12700H 处理器，首发价如下：</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="8e8b"> i7-12700H + 16G ：7999 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="6a01"> i7-12700H + 32G ：8999 元</p></li></ul><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="d0b4"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/f30136c8-b584-4016-adf7-25457778f696.png" w="1000" h="1000" title="首发 17.3 英寸 3K 带鱼屏，联想 ThinkBook Plus 17 上架，7999 元起" width="1000" height="820" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="ce1c">IT之家曾报道，今年早些时候，联想发布了这款笔记本。配置方面，这款笔记本将<strong> i7-12700H 处理器</strong>，45W 性能释放，可选 16GB 或 32GB 的 LPDDR5-4800 内存，SSD 为 512GB PCIe 4.0。</p><p data-vmark="8933">屏幕方面，这款笔记本的主屏幕为 <strong>17.3 英寸 IPS 屏，21:10 比例，3072x1440 分辨率，120Hz 刷新率，100% sRGB 色域，支持触控</strong>。C 面的副屏为 8 英寸 IPS 屏，10:16 比例，支持 4096 级压感笔，支持 10 点触控；支持硬件级分屏，可用于线上会议记录、线上教学批改作业以及视频编辑。</p><p data-vmark="5086">这款笔记本的尺寸为 410.9 x 230.2 x 17.95 mm，重量不到 2kg，接口包括雷电 4、全功能 USB-C、HDMI 等，<strong>附送 E-Color Pen 智能取色笔</strong>。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOQJK1olXgICXFxZAEsSBl8IGloRWgAHVV9YAUgUC19MRANLAjZbERscSkAJHTdNTwcKBlMdBgABFksWAmsPHV4UXAMLV11VFxJSXzI4AT9nPHR8KAI_TzFVQAl-bDpLHHx-NFJROE4XBmkIE14dWjYBVllfDk8SAGg4eDx7AEVSMQMCDU4nA244WjUVXAIGU1xcCnsXAGgMGVoQWwAGZF5aDEIQBGgIHloUXgIyVFZaOBdVUS5KK2slXjYyZF5tC3tJbW5bG1gWDgVWOgNZQxtcQTVJdVITWgECU11eOEkWAm0KK2s" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="10056740048229"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/111523/25/26488/274353/62dd3254E1850d299/739bf99fdd3456f2.jpg" title="首发 17.3 英寸 3K 带鱼屏，联想 ThinkBook Plus 17 上架，7999 元起" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name"> ThinkPad 联想 ThinkBook Plus 17 </span></span><span class="card-abstract">i7-12700H 16G 触控屏 17CD</span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">7999 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
